ygData.subject: Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bindarah. ... Thank you very much. The map on page15 in the Everquest Shadow of Luclin Game Manual was confusing me. Usually North is at the top of the map
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Biltilie Dwimmerlaik"
<biltilie@m...> wrote:
> > hopper. I'm having fun but I'm still looking for Registrar
Bindarah.
>
> have a look at
> http://www.eqatlas.com/luclin/sharvahluppermap.html
>
> i think she was at (16), inside a building. quite some time ago.
>
> - bilt
>
> --
> Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
Thank you very much. The map on page15 in the Everquest Shadow of
Luclin Game Manual was confusing me. Usually North is at the top of
the map instead of at the right hand side. G. I've located the maps
now. How do I get into the crater and out of it without having to
fall in and get killed to return tothe city? I'm starting my hunt for
the three requested bare skinned rock hoppers.

Edward
